item.title: Virtualization and Containerization: Which one to pick?
item.description: Software applications have traditionally been closely tied to the specific servers they run on and the operating systems they use. Virtualization and Containerization let you run multiple isolated applications on a single physical server while sharing and managing resources between them.

item.title: Reddit Discloses Bitcoin and Ether Holdings in IPO Filing (2 minute read)
